p: During approximately 1,790 Kilonzo trap nights, a total of 836 host-seeking fleas were collected. Ctenocephalides felis and Echinophaga gallinacea represented 61% (n = 510) and 37% (n = 311) of the captures, respectively. Other species captured included Tunga penetrans (n = 2), X. brasiliensis (n = 1) and X. cheopis (n = 12). The total numbers of fleas collected, and total numbers of the nearly cosmopolitan flea species, C. felis and E. gallinacea, were similar between sites located above compared with below 1300 m elevation.
